<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Generate Result">4b876aa693ad4210742c3a8efaba10a6</macroponent><name>Set Generated Response in Textarea 1</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**eg
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {

if(event.name =='GET_MOCK_RECORD_ID'){
    var setData = 'this is vikram Singh and it is set from client script';

    api.setState('generated_result', setData);
   event.setState('generated_result', setData);
}
else {
    alert('Event not working');
}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-18 05:17:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>4280bc4393a10210742c3a8efaba10e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Generated Response in Textarea 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Maantic Gen AI" source="x_1238492_maanti_0">2237eed693e50210742c3a8efaba1022</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Maantic Gen AI">2237eed693e50210742c3a8efaba1022</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4280bc4393a10210742c3a8efaba10e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-18 10:01:50</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
